org.theospi.portfolio.presentation

Interface PresentationManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CleanupableService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PresentationManagerImpl

    public interface PresentationManager
extends CleanupableService
    This class provides a management layer into the presentations included in the system.
    Author:
    John Bush (jbush@rsmart.com) $Header: /opt/CVS/osp2.x/presentation/api/src/java/org/theospi/portfolio/presentation/PresentationManager.java,v 1.5 2005/10/26 23:53:01 jellis Exp $ $Revision: 8645 $ $Date: 2012-02-24 18:08:11 -0500 (Fri, 24 Feb 2012) $

      • findPublicPresentations

        Collection findPublicPresentations(String siteId)
        Return a list presentation ids of all publicly shared presentations (optionally filtered by site)
        Parameters:
        siteId - return only from this site if specified (may be null)
        Returns:
        collection of presentations

      • findPublicPresentations

        Collection findPublicPresentations(Agent viewer,
                                 String toolId,
                                 String showHidden)
        Return a list presentation ids of all publicly shared presentations (optionally filtered by toolId)
        Parameters:
        owner - current user
        toolId - current tool (or null to ignore)
        showHidden - option to show all, hidden, not hidden portfolios
        Returns:
        collection of presentations

      • getPublicPropertyForm

        String getPublicPropertyForm(Presentation presentation)
        Return the XML document string corresponding to the specified public portfolio's propertyForm (portfolio must be publicly viewable).
        Parameters:
        portfolioId - public portfolio
        Returns:
        XML document string or null if error

      • findAllPresentations

        Collection findAllPresentations(Agent viewer,
                              String toolId,
                              String showHidden)
        Return a list of all presentations agent can view, optionally filtered by toolId.
        Parameters:
        owner - current user
        toolId - current tool (or null to ignore)
        showHidden - option to show all, hidden, not hidden portfolios
        Returns:
        collection of presentations

      • findOtherPresentationsUnrestricted

        Collection findOtherPresentationsUnrestricted(Agent owner,
                                            String toolId,
                                            String showHidden)
        Return a unrestricted list of presentations for given toolId Portfolios returned may be unpublished/inactive/unshared, but the current user is not the owner User must have permission and portfolio.unrestricted.view must be enabled
        Parameters:
        owner - current user
        toolId - current tool
        showHidden - option to show all, hidden, not hidden portfolios
        Returns:
        collection of presentations

      • findSharedPresentations

        Collection findSharedPresentations(Agent viewer,
                                 String toolId,
                                 String showHidden)
        Return a list of presentation shared with agent, optionally filtered by toolId.
        Parameters:
        owner - current user
        toolId - current tool (or null to ignore)
        showHidden - option to show all, hidden, not hidden portfolios
        Returns:
        collection of presentations

        Parameters:

        toolId - current tool (or null to ignore)
        showHidden - option to show all, hidden, not hidden portfolios
        Returns:

      • copyPresentation

        Presentation copyPresentation(Id presentationId)
        Copy an existing presentation, this will duplicate the presentation for the current owner, does not include comments

        Returns:
        the copy of the presentation
